q: Modified at 5:28 pm on Jan 18, 2011 WINDSOR, Ontario- Chrysler is debating the future of its minivans even as it starts making the 2011 Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town and Country this week. We need to completely rethink the minivan, CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday at the Canadian plant where Chrysler's minivans are made. "We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile." Sergio Marchionne said that could mean new products
